summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mutual Fund Screener MVP. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate). Core frontend features working well including fund listings, detail pages, NAV charts, and admin panel. Found authentication issues with preferences page and some UI interaction problems with dropdown filters.

ui_bugs.issue: Category and history filter dropdowns have overlay interception issues preventing proper option selection

integration_issues.issue: Navigating to /preferences redirects to login page instead of loading preferences interface with weight sliders

passed_tests: Login page with Google OAuth button
Dashboard displays fund list with scores (15 funds)
Fund detail page with NAV charts and metrics
Admin panel recompute trigger (15/15 funds computed)
Fund cards clickable and displaying proper information
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix preferences page authentication issue - currently redirects to login instead of loading weight sliders interface. Improve dropdown filter interactions to resolve overlay interception issues in dashboard filters.
